It's common for users to have multiple accounts: several personal, several work- or client-related. And it's annoying to switch between them every time you receive a Google Meet‚Ñ¢ link or open Gmail‚Ñ¢.

With the Default Account Manager for Google‚Ñ¢ products, you can, for example, set up work accounts for Google Meet‚Ñ¢ and personal for Gmail‚Ñ¢, etc.
